name: Skyward Atlas
effect: Increases Elemental DMG Bonus by {0}%. Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to earn the favor of the clouds. which actively seek out nearby enemies to attack for 15s, dealing {1}% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 30s.
description: A cloud atlas symbolizing Dvalin and its former master, the Anemo Archon. It details the winds and clouds of the northern regions and contains the powers of the sky and wind.
